name: GangZoneFlashForAll
description: GangZoneFlashForAll flashes a gangzone for all players.

params_body.name: flashcolor
params_body.description: The color to flash the gang zone, as an integer or hex in RGBA color format. Alpha transparency supported.

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
